title: Mindfulness Basics
description: An introduction to mindfulness practice for everyday life

questions.question: What is the essence of mindfulness?
options: Paying attention to the present moment without judgment

questions.question: What should you do when your mind wanders during meditation?
options: Get frustrated and try harder to focus
Give up since wandering means you're doing it wrong
Gently notice and return attention to the present

subtitle: Start where you are, with what you have
